alert.note: Alert for Niobrara County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 8:50PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Sioux and northeastern Niobrara Counties through 915 PM MDT... At 850 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northeast of Lance Creek, or 26 miles north of Lusk, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mule Creek Junction, Redbird and Lance Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
